resources.string: Meet the automatic social media manager that lets you live in the moment without distractions
Don\'t have an account\? Sign up here
Must be at least 8 characters, with at least one upper-case and one number
Set personalized locations where you will be easily distracted and customized which applications you would like to limit
Once you arrive at the location, your applications will be automatically turned off so you can commit to time
Commit to time with friends together and share locations
